title: Prince Caspian (The Chronicles of Narnia #2)
description: Storyline: Prince Caspian (The Chronicles of Narnia (Publication Order) #2) \n A prince fights for his crown. Narnia... where animals talk... where trees walk... here a battle is about to begin. A prince denied his rightful throne gathers an army in a desperate attempt to rid his land of a false king. But in the end, it is a battle of honor between two men alone that will decide the fate of an entire world.\n
author: C. S. Lewis
